LanguageData.Battery.label: battery
LanguageData.Battery.description: Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet.
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.label: TODO
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.label: geothermal generator
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.description: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.
LanguageData.HiddenConduit.label: TODO
LanguageData.PowerConduit.label: power conduit
LanguageData.PowerConduit.description: A set of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.PowerSwitch.label: power switch
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.label: solar generator
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.WatermillGenerator.label: TODO
LanguageData.WaterproofConduit.label: TODO
LanguageData.WindTurbine.label: wind turbine
LanguageData.WindTurbine.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.label: fueled generator
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming wood fuel. Must be fueled by hand.
